text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are TRUE? (a) In the Many-to-One multithreading model, many kernel threads are mapped to a single user thread. (b) The One-to-One multithreading model suffers from scalability issues. (c) The Many-to-Many multithreading model always uses equal numbers of kernel and user threads. (d) In the Many-to-One multithreading model, a system call from a user thread will block an entire task.
